about.span:
I’m a 20-year-old backend developer with a passion for programming that kicked off when I was just 12.
Ever since I wrote my first line of code, I’ve been hooked on solving complex problems and creating efficient backend systems that power seamless user experiences.

Designing and building scalable APIs and server-side architectures.
Working with databases (SQL, NoSQL) to ensure data reliability and performance.
Implementing secure and efficient backend solutions with a focus on maintainability.
Exploring emerging technologies to stay ahead in the ever-evolving tech world.

A deep curiosity for understanding how things work under the hood.
Strong attention to clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
Ability to quickly adapt to new technologies and frameworks.
Collaborative spirit—I love working with teams and contributing to open-source projects.

Languages: Python, Node.js, Java, php
Frameworks: Express.js, Flask, Hono.js
Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis, MariaDB
Tools: Docker, Git, CI/CD Pipelines

From building simple command-line programs as a kid to architecting full-fledged backend systems, coding has always been my creative outlet.
I’ve worked on everything from personal side projects to collaborative, real-world applications.
I’m currently diving deeper into cloud computing (AWS) and microservices to sharpen my expertise in modern backend development.
Take a look at some of my projects and contributions on GitHub
When I’m not coding, I’m probably brainstorming new ideas, gaming, or exploring how to automate something cool.

about.text: Let’s connect and build something awesome together! 🚧✨
